statusHistory.description: The Rumbar Pirates were active over 50 years before the current timeline
The crew was wiped out in the Florian Triangle (revealed in later episodes)

keyMoments.title: Rumbar Pirates' Promise to Laboon Revealed
keyMoments.description: Crocus reveals that the Rumbar Pirates befriended Laboon 50 years ago and promised to return after sailing the Grand Line, but they never came back.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the emotional core of Laboon's story and sets up Brook's eventual introduction as a surviving member of this crew.

reveals.information: The Rumbar Pirates befriended Laboon over 50 years ago
Promised to return to Laboon after sailing the Grand Line
Left Laboon with Crocus at Twin Cape before entering the Grand Line

statusHistory.description: Baroque Works is operating as a secret criminal organization

ship.name: Various
ship.description: Baroque Works agents use various ships

jollyRoger.description: Baroque Works uses code names instead of a traditional pirate flag

keyMoments.title: First Baroque Works Agents Appear
keyMoments.description: Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday are introduced as Baroque Works frontier agents, marking the first appearance of members from this organization.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the Baroque Works organization that becomes the main antagonist group for the Arabasta saga.

reveals.information: Baroque Works is a secret organization with numbered agents
Mr. 9 and Miss Wednesday are frontier agents of Baroque Works
Frontier agents are tasked with gathering food and resources for Whisky Peak
